title: NY Times Key Headline: Love, Lust…
content:
Hi guys, looks for the headline face for 'LOVE, LUST, HEARTBREAK'

Closest I've found so far are Gravur Condensed and Flama Condensed

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024012620im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen_4758.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024012620im_/http:/typophile.com/files/91_keyscan_4473.jpg)
author: paulstonier

comments.content: It's really close to [Miso](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024012620/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Miso), except the "I" is different. Maybe a customized version? Also, horizontally scaled.
I found a few of those kind of cases. Conduit is almost identical except for that I. Possibly custom, but hoping not.
Very nice. It looks so familiar. I too hope it's not custom.
Most of the NYTimes fonts are custom, sorry.

I think you nailed it, Akira. That is one that I had not checked yet.

Thank you very much.
